thread.title: Report: At Least 180 Federal Employees Planning To Obstruct Trump’s Agenda Through Civil Disobedience
thread.title_full: Report: At Least 180 Federal Employees Planning To Obstruct Trump’s Agenda Through Civil Disobedience

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Report: At Least 180 Federal Employees Planning To Obstruct Trump’s Agenda Through Civil Disobedience
text:
02:28pm February 1, 2017   
Remember when we started seeing reports about federal works quitting their jobs if Trump became president? 
Jazz Shaw wrote a great piece about how a lot of them are backing down from that. 
However, that doesn’t mean Trump is out of the woods when it comes to federal workers who don’t like him. 
Justin Holcomb has the details on that. 
From Townhall : 
President Donald Trump surely realizes that most workers employed by the federal government diabolically oppose his views of America. 
According to a new report , at least 180 of those employees “have signed up for a workshop featuring expert advice on workers’ rights and expressing civil disobedience.” Also, dozens more federal workers have attended a support groups for discussing opposition to the Trump administration. 
Not showing up to work, taking extended vacations, filing worker’s rights lawsuits, and obstructing the process in any way possible are just a few of the legal ways federal workers can bring President Trump’s agenda to a halt. 
Classy… 
If you don’t agree with your boss that much you should quit your job. 
Absolutely ridiculous to cash a paycheck every week while not doing your job. 
I don’t remember seeing stories like this when Obama became president… LIKE this article?
